page.password_must_be_different: New password must be different from old password.
page.profile_subtitle:
View and update your profile information, including your name, email,
and phone number. You can also update your billing address, or change
your password.
page.orders_subtitle:
View your previous orders and their status. You can also create
returns or exchanges for your orders if needed.
page.shipping_subtitle:
View and update your shipping addresses, you can add as many as you
like. Saving your addresses will make them available during checkout.

customer_service.subtitle: You can find frequently asked questions and answers on our customer service page.
